short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gacha Life wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Gacha Life background. Gacha Life wallpaper background themes for game fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Rotate Gacha Life wallpapers every time a new tab is opened.
2. Customize your Gacha Life background or select favorites in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google Search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media platforms.
5. Automatic display of the current date and time.
6. New Note feature to jot down your tasks.
7. Quick links to your most frequently visited websites.
8. Simple bookmark access.
9. Shortcut panel for adding and accessing favorite websites quickly.
10. Instant access to Google applications.
11. Easy navigation to additional themes.
12. Convenient social media sharing options.
13. Fast download of new wallpapers.
14. Quick link to play games.
15. Activate engaging animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Gacha Life tab.
